alert.note: Alert for Thurston (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 29 at 9:20PM CDT until September 29 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Thurston County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 919 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southeast of Wakefield, or 10 miles east of Wayne, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. This storm has a history of producing quarter size hail and damage to trees. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Emerson and Winnebago Reservation. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
